As we were walking up the street, we looked in the windows and saw such a beautiful looking setting that we just had to go in. by the front door, we saw some signs in the window - and one of them just sealed the deal for us:  1 euro for a cana & tapa.  sold.we went in, sat at the bar, had a couple of beers and tapas.  what really stands out is the decor of the place - it's a stunning grand dame of a building.  anything art nouveau makes me swoon.  as for the full menu, i haven't a clue what's on it or what the prices are like.  but the service at the bar was great.  we were really happy we popped in and got 2 beers and 2 canas for under 5 bucks.
